name: Merfolk Scout
proficiencies: Skill: Nature +2 | Skill: Perception +3, Stealth +4, Survival +3

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight.
special_abilities.desc: The merfolk scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
special_abilities.desc: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The merfolk scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
